Key Match Events: Virat Kohli scored 103* (97) and was named Player of the Match
India won by 7 wickets (with 51 balls remaining)
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli expressed his satisfaction with the team's performance
India's captain Rohit Sharma highlighted the importance of the win in the tournament
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played under lights at the Maharashtra Cricket Association Stadium in Pune
Others: The match was part of the ICC Cricket World Cup 2023-24
The match was officiated by Adrian Holdstock, Richard Kettleborough, Kumar Dharmasena, Marais Erasmus, and Andy Pycroft
